mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM CARD WHERE CARD_LOCATION LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

SELECT RNUM, CARD_NUM, CARD_LOCATION, BLIND, CARD_BUDGET, USER_NAME, TO_CHAR(CARD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CARD_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, DATA.* FROM (SELECT CARD_NUM, CARD_LOCATION, BLIND, CARD_BUDGET, USER_NAME, CARD_DATE FROM VIEW_CARDLIST WHERE CARD_LOCATION LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY CARD_NUM DESC) DATA) WHERE RNUM >= #{start} AND RNUM <= #{end}

SELECT CARD_NUM, SIGN_NUM, CARD_LAT, CARD_LNG, CARD_ZIPCODE, CARD_ADDRESS, CARD_SADDRESS, CARD_LOCATION , CARD_BUDGET, CARD_COMMENT, CARD_IMG1, CARD_IMG2, CARD_IMG3, TO_DATE(CARD_VISITDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CARD_VISIDAE , TO_DATE(CARD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CARD_DATE FROM CARD WHERE CARD_NUM = #{card_num}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

SELECT RNUM, BOOK_NUM, BOOK_TITLE, USER_NAME, TO_CHAR(BOOK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOOK_DATE, BLINE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, DATA.* FROM (SELECT BOOK_NUM, BOOK_TITLE, USER_NAME, BOOK_DATE, BLINE FROM VIEW_BOOKLIST WHERE BOOK_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY BOOK_NUM DESC) DATA) WHERE RNUM >= #{start} AND RNUM <= #{end}
